Robust Financial Performance (FY2025):As of March 31, 2025, MOTILALOFS showcased strong financial results for FY2025, driven by its Wealth Management and Investment Banking sectors.

Operating Revenue Growth:The company's operating revenue increased by 31% year-over-year.

Segmental Growth:

Asset & Private Wealth Management PAT grew by 36% YoY.

Capital Market business PAT grew by 31% YoY.

Wealth Management business PAT grew by 28% YoY.

Net Profit Milestone:Operating PAT crossed ₹2,000 crores, contributing to the overall PAT growth of 31% YoY to ₹2,016 crores.

Strong Net Worth:As of March 31, 2025, the company had a robust net worth of ₹11,079 crores, up by 27% YoY, and an ROE of 25% for FY25.

Growth Drivers:Strong performance in Asset & Private Wealth Management, Capital Market, and Wealth Management businesses were key growth drivers.

Market Share Gains:All capital market businesses gained market share.

Future Outlook:The company expressed confidence in India's financialization theme and its ability to capitalize on future growth opportunities.

Investments in Technology and Infrastructure:MOTILALOFS has been making significant investments in technology and infrastructure to enhance operational efficiency and scalability.

Housing Finance Business Growth:The Housing Finance business is on a growth trajectory, with substantial increases in disbursements and assets under management.

Cyberattack in February 2024:Motilal Oswal Financial Services faced a cyberattack by the ransomware group LockBit, which claimed to have accessed confidential data.

SEBI Penalty (August 12, 2025):SEBI levied a penalty of ₹11 lakhs on MOTILALOFS for alleged violations of certain SEBI/Exchange Circulars noted during a comprehensive joint inspection between April 1, 2022 and October 31, 2023.

Pending SEBI Inquiry:As of May 1, 2025, MOTILALOFS had received a Show Cause Notice from SEBI regarding an inspection related to order placement for the period January 1, 2024 to September 30, 2024. A settlement application was filed, and the matter was pending.

Other Pending SEBI Matters:There were pending settlement applications related to matters involving TradeTron and other Algo Platforms (Notice dated October 8, 2024) and the dealings of client Rajni Chaturvedi (Notice dated February 20, 2025).

Eastern India Expansion (announced September 2024):Motilal Oswal Wealth Management announced plans to add 354 new business partners in Eastern India by March 2025.

Bihar Expansion (announced September 25, 2024):MOTILALOFS announced plans to expand its business in Bihar by appointing new partners and opening a new office in Patna by December 2024.

Segmental Growth:Asset & Private Wealth Management PAT grew by 36% YoY.Capital Market business PAT grew by 31% YoY.Wealth Management business PAT grew by 28% YoY.
